website_summaries.verdict: Protects you from the elements and keeps you dry and warm.
pros: 2.5-layer system keeps runners protected from wind and rain but is still breathable
Lightweight and offers a great fit

customer_reviews.title: Held up all day in the marathon monsoon!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket just in time for the Boston marathon. I originally wanted to buy a similar jacket on amazon for twice the price and was skeptical this one would be as good. BUT let me tell you, after standing out in torrential rains and high winds all day long while volunteering at the Boston marathon, I can sat without a doubt this jacket will not let a drop of ware past it!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Carnein

customer_reviews.title: High performance, great looking jacket at half the price of the hip brands
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket and great looking, which I did not expect. Large was perfect for me at 6' - 180 lbs. Definitely a rain coat, with more water proofing than a simple nylon windbreaker with waterproof coating. I'd say a little more on water proof side than breathable, but most of the time I've warn it so far it wasn't actually raining and I kept it on for warmth and did not get clammy. Perfect weight - not too light, not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Steele

customer_reviews.title: Very long sleeves and very large hood.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a very light-weight rain jacket for travel, and the Paradox fits that bill. I've only worn it in the damp and chilly Pacific NW environment so far and will be interested to see how it does in a less humid climate. The texture of the material is a bit stiff and plastic-like, but the blue grey color I find a nice contrast to the competition. A couple of negatives: the sleeves are way longer than needed and needed some extra length to the hook-and-loop fasteners on the cuffs to adequately close them; and the hood is absurdly too large. All in all, however, I think this a good jacket at its price point.
customer_reviews.author: Edward W

customer_reviews.title: This is a good lite rain jacket.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good lite rain jacket. I purchased this for a recent trip I took to Alaska. It worked well minus really hard rain. I took a hike with my brother in law in some pretty hard rain and it was able to penetrate the jacket after about an hour and a half. Not to the point that I was soaked inside but just a bit damp. It did much better than the Columbia jacket he had on. He was soaked under the jacket. I would by this again.
customer_reviews.author: RACINMI

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for tall, lanky, teen w broad shoulders. Slim Fit! Yeah!
customer_reviews.text: Love the slimmer fit and extra long sleeves just what I needed for a tall lanky teen. Quality is good and styling is good. Based on other reviewers on fit, I bought a large so he can layer it over a hoodie. Size chart suggested medium for a 38. Glad I went w large. Order a size up if you want to layer . The blue is cobalt, it is slighly heathered and makes color a little subdued. I like it. Will probably buy more
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! I needed a light-weight water/wind-proof jacket to wear in the summer when I go to a research island off the Georgia coast. I received it much sooner than expected. It just so happened that we had a warm, extremely rainy Christmas, so I was able to test it out. I ordered it in a men's size because they tend to fit me better. It fits well with room to wear something long-sleeved under it if needed. It kept me completely dry in the pouring rain. I also did not feel hot or sweaty in it. It also dried quickly. The color is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Would for sure buy this jacket again.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, light, and stylish jacket. Super great price for it's quality. Very impressed with how water proof/repellent it is as well, I held it under the sink for 10 minutes and it was bone dry! It's very easy to roll or fold up and tuck away in a backpack or even fit in some pockets. The one thing I would say is a negative, however, is that it just is not breathable, at all. It advertises as being breathable but it's just straight up wrong unfortunately, luckily, I don't care too much because I live in a cold climate so wearing a hoodie under this makes sure I keep nice and warm all day.
customer_reviews.author: woops

customer_reviews.title: Wets out in prolonged use
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is super comfortable. However, working in the Adirondack Mountains of NY, this does not hold up adequately to heavy or prolonged rain. After a while of hiking, my shoulders and upper back were wet. Also, this gets you super clammy inside since there are obviously no pit zips or ventilation, and my forearms were always wet from sweat in the summer. Look into a high quality rain jacket like from TNF or other bigger brands if you want something that will not wet out due to better waterproofing, and get ventilation!
customer_reviews.author: David Lenehan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my weird shape & keeps me dry.
customer_reviews.text: If you are a skinny dude with really long arms and a huge melon, like myself, then this is your jacket. If not then look elsewhere. It's truly breathable. Condensation isn't a problem. It kept me dry in hours of steady rain while hiking. I wish it had a mesh liner and some means of securing the storm flap against wind.
customer_reviews.author: Tim W.

customer_reviews.title: A good waterproof jacket for the Pacific NW
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a women's jacket but it fit too snugly for my mature figure. Someone suggested I order a man's medium size and let me try on hers. I ordered one and really enjoy having a jacket that is waterproof, not just water resistant. The breathability is also a great idea, as the PacNW can get wet and muggy at times. I shall enjoy having this jacket as one of my 3 jackets for winter.
customer_reviews.author: BarbaraDBH

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This material is plastic. The graphic and description gave me the impression that it was more of a soft fabric similar to a north face. It's a great rain jacket. But I was expecting something a little more comfortable and softer than this. Either way I still love it. The fit is a little loose but I will be wearing this in the colder rainy months as an outer layer so it's fine. The color matches the blue in the picture. My biggest complaint is that it was not packaged well and arrived EXTREMELY wrinkled. It's not easy to get the wrinkles out other than wearing it in the rain a bunch of times.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R Mailly

customer_reviews.title: it zips up. it zips down. like a zipper should
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. Zipper works flawlessly. I mention that because every rain jacket I've ever bought the zipper seems to be crap. The zipper was invented in 1893. It's 2018. I get there may a bad zipper here and there, but come on. 125 years seems plenty long enough to perfect the zipper.... Well...I think I've gotten off topic here. It's a great jacket with a great zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Great windbreaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great windbreaker. The color is different than the image online... better for me! It's closer to a powder blue than a cobalt. The front chest pocket holds my phone so well, I forget that it's there. Side pockets have good zippers. The material does breathe better than others. I cannot speak for the waterproof,yet, as I live in Southern California.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice jacket that doesn't look like a rain jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the jacket. It feels nice and whats most attractive about this product is that it doesn't LOOK like a rain jacket it looks like a normal hoodie but with the option of being wind and water proof. I'd definitely recommend other people to buy this for to wear casually, for cycling or running by commuting, training, or recreationally. Now I might come back and redo this review depending on how DURABLE it is..that is yet to be known.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bubblegum marshmellow pineapple pie...
customer_reviews.text: When I 1st received the jacket, it had a weird plastic smell, but after I washed it. The smell was completely gone, but just remember not to put this jacket into the dryer and instead hang dry. It's not very thick at all, so it's not meant to keep you warm. Just use it to keep you dry. Overall the fit was perfect for me. I got a medium and I'm 5'9" 210lbs with a six pack of beer abs and a 40" chest. Looks dope as just a regular everyday jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Brae

customer_reviews.title: Good, Solid Jacket that does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought this jacket for a trip out to Southeast Asia and it came in clutch while climbing a mountain in Bali, Indonesia. My friend laughed at me for bringing this jacket when it was warm and mostly sunny. Sure enough the higher we get, the cloudier and colder it got. By the time we hit the summit we were met with a tropical thunderstorm. This bad boy kept both myself and my backpack nice and insulated during the storm. So guess who got the last laugh? The guy who stayed dry and warm ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me dry
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect. It keeps me dry and fits over warmer coats in cold weather so I can keep warm while staying dry. The jacket itself is not enough to keep you warm, but it provides more than enough room to accommodate warmer items under it.
customer_reviews.author: AA2010

customer_reviews.title: Nice rain jacket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my North Face rain coat seemed to absorb rain. While it was waterproof, the jacket would absorb the water on the outside. This Paradox jacket does a nice job of wicking away the rain. The fit is nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Mer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Summer Rains
customer_reviews.text: It's a little long in the sleeves for me, but it doesn't bother me. It's perfect for summer showers in humid locales. The cooling interior can make it feel like you're getting wet, but you're really dry! Hard to describe. If you wear this in cold rainy weather, you'd need a jacket underneath.
customer_reviews.author: CUZ

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat this jacket. I used it at a recent sports tournament and got rained on in this jacket work perfectly. I'm about 5 10 and weigh 180 in this fits just right
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i want in a breathable rain jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I jus got my rain jacket today.. i work outside Nd need something that keeps me dry. My last rain jacket was lightweight but it absorbed water like a paper towel. I looked for over a month for the right jacket i think i found it in this one. The inside is just like the outside its smooth and very comfortable. The water just rolls right off the material.... I love it..
customer_reviews.author: dominique sherrod

customer_reviews.title: Rain jacket is an excellent value and fits well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jacket. The quality and fit are excellent for the price. I would definitely recommend and will buy again when this one eventually wears out. The only quibble I have is that I wish it had a loop attached to the inside (by the collar) for hanging on a coat hook. Most jackets have this sort of thing. Other than that, I am very happy with this jacket. It repels rain very well and helps keep me warm and dry. You will be glad you bought this jacket. Just compare the price of this jacket to more famous name brands and be happy for the money you are saving.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Looker

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, water-proof and does not feel like you are wearing a plastic bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lightweight, water-proof jacket to handle the hot, rainy season in northern Zambia (Late Feb-early March). It did not disappoint. I really appreciated the over-sized hood. It kept me dry and was breathable enough that I did not get overheated. I wear a 40R jacket and it fit well while wearing two thin layers. Considering buying another as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: El Sparquito

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, roomy and comfy. I wear a large, so that's what I bought. This fits great over a light jacket- carry it on the bike, just in case. Got the matching pants, too... good combo. I ordered them in black, but they're gonna be gray. Customer service says they are "heathered" whatever that means. Still love em
customer_reviews.author: Ruff n Ready

customer_reviews.title: Solid jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Water beads and runs off without a problem, all the stitching appears to be quality and reinforced with a rubberized seal to keep water out. Lots of large pockets which is nice. I would describe this as a slim fit: it fits true to size but the bottom is pretty tapered and stays close to your waist. The sleeves are fairly long, but not in a bad way: i'm 6'2 and have long arms and this reaches close to my knuckles.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Trejo

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof, but not without Merit
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look, fit and finish, but any real rain and you will absolutely positively be soaked. It’s a really good light windbreaker, but calling waterproof is a huge stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and light jacket, great for rainy dog walks
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for in an inexpensive and light rain jacket for those rainy days where I need to walk my dog. Buy it to your normal size as it comes a little baggier than a normal jacket would. I'm 6'4" 225lbs and went with the XL. There is plenty room around the chest and waist the sleeves are long and cover my arm with no problems. I had to cinch the adjustments a little around the wrists and waist.
customer_reviews.author: T. KOWALCZYK

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED AT TWICE THE PRICE.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic buy! Very well fabricated and lots of great features. It performed as intended in the rain and kept me reasonably warm in the cold blowing wind, It is no substitute for a warm coat, but it is is no cheap windbreaker. It is a great addition to a well-planned outdoor/active wardrobe. I almost always wear a large and this fit very true to my size.
customer_reviews.author: K. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Rain Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Used it many times in hard rain, works like a champ. Don't use during the summer time or when it is really hot. Pancho's are better for hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Not wet
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these jackets for women and ordered one for my husband. It is finally raining in California and these jackets are a necessity in the "rivers of rain" we are blessed with. The waters beads up on these jackets, not soaks through. Water "resistant" just isn't working these days; we need water "repellent" that works. Happens to look great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rose O.

customer_reviews.title: A great rain jacket
customer_reviews.text: This rain jacket performs as advertised. Kept me dry during a steady rain without becoming a steam bath inside.
customer_reviews.author: pw808

customer_reviews.title: price was good too. Hiked 35 miles in the rain and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, price was good too. Hiked 35 miles in the rain and while i wasn't completely bone dry the jacket did well. Have used it a few times since then for other less intense events when it was raining, worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Quality surprised me
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance based on reviews. It’s really nice. Light yet not flimsy. Definitely waterproof. For the money, it’s a no brainer 5 star item. I bought a 2nd for my dad.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for rain in warm weather!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I purchased this for my husband for our trip to Vietnam. We needed something that was waterproof (not "quick-dry") and light enough for the 85 - 90 degree weather. This was easy to stuff into our day bags for the occasional 20 -30 minute showers. Plenty of pockets to keep things dry I'd highly recommended this item. My husband is 6'0" and 170 lbs - usually wears a Medium-size tshirt and this was true to size. The medium was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: daflower

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty light weight and kept him perfectly dry in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend as he works outside all day. We live in Florida so I didn't want it to be too hot for him. It is pretty light weight and kept him perfectly dry in a steady downpour. Was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy SumnerTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Rain Rain Rain.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rain jacket. It blocks the wind and rain perfectly. I couldn't ask for a better product. The rain literally beads up and rolls away like nothing. I will say that it is a rather thin jacket but there is enough space for a fleece or sweater underneath. And it is thin enough to wear under much thicker coats.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a good jacket, I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this jacket I thought it was a great deal. The jacket is just a little on the big side for me but it is a rain jacket so I think it fits just fine. The material feels high quality and since it rained here the other day I got to test it's functionality and it passed with flying colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is waterproof. Kind of sticky on the inside if you are wearing short sleeves. Haven't hiked with it yet but plan on in the next several weeks. It is light weight so it will be good for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Mirna Eads

customer_reviews.title: Not Completely Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rain jacket a few months ago but was only recently able to use it. The waterproofing is not at all consistent. The hood, shoulders, and part of one arm were letting water through within 30min, in a light drizzle. Very disappointed and would return it if I could, but I'm now outside the 30 day return policy limit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Rain Jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Like the way the jacket fits. Great color. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Brittain

customer_reviews.title: Great rain jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This rain jacket is the best I have own. The materials is quite sturdy, its breatheable, and comfortable. I can also roll this up and pack it in my small slingpack and it is lightweight. A must have for anyone that does commuting to work and back and hates getting soaked in surprising rain storms.
customer_reviews.author: Shin0bi1

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. It's my final layer for wind/water/snow prevention. The only thing that is somewhat annoying is the hood. If the jacket isn't zipped all the way up the hood flops in front of my face and blocks my vision. It is a pretty lightweight jacket and it rolls up nice to take with for sudden rain showers and such.
customer_reviews.author: shard92

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: Took this on an Alaskan cruise this summer. Worked exactly as intended. Kept me dry. I bought it larger as to layer underneath. Realize that this jacket is by no means a thermal solution. I just keeps you dry and breaks the winds a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Bruin248

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his trip to Ireland. He used it most the whole time he was there. It rained off and on all the time. He said it worked great. He wore it over a light jacket or sweat shirt. Repels water and keeps rain off your glasses because of the hood design.
customer_reviews.author: Bigred

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Walked in Crescent City driving rain...stayed dry as a bone...light & comfortable...bought the medium and it fits very well...i’m 5’9”, 180 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Maffett

customer_reviews.title: Slim fit
customer_reviews.text: It feels like slim fit. I could wear a really really really skinny sweater under it. I like the pockets it got. It holds real good against the rain. I wish it came with an option of buying pants along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Luna       'CHICO 8'

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Slant a lot of time and money looking for a lightweight waterproof jacket for spring and summer rain. This jacket is perfect. Very breathable, doesn't even feel like you have anything on over you regular clothes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kargbo

customer_reviews.title: Quality coat, great value
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is stylish and of surprisingly high quality given the price. My wife has a North Face raincoat similar to this and it's impossible to tell the difference in material. This jcoat is not cheap by any definition of the word, just inexpensive. The coat is just a little baggy, but this is ideal since it can be worn over numerous layers if it happens to be cold and rainy. The coat is meant to keep you dry, not warm. If you need a quality coat without the outrageous price tag of a Nort Face or Patagonia, then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: art

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Keeps water out and let's your ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Keeps water out and let's your body moisture out (breathes). Deep pockets and very packable.
customer_reviews.author: Geo Man

customer_reviews.title: The jacket itself was great. Looked nice and quality seemed legitimate for the ...
customer_reviews.text: The jacket itself was great. Looked nice and quality seemed legitimate for the price you pay. Deducted 1 star as the fit was far too big. I wear large in everything I buy and this was by far bigger than everything I own. Item was sold out of mediums.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice looking, practical
customer_reviews.text: Light, nice looking, practical. It folds small and it is practically weightless. Perfect for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelio Grisanty

customer_reviews.title: this jacket works out great.
customer_reviews.text: Living in an area where we get a lot of rain, this jacket works out great.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a book bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine to keep it in my book bag for daily commute to work. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I really like the jacket. It fits well. I was looking for one that didn't have elastic cuffs on the sleeves, because I always stretch out the elastic over time. Keeps the rain off well which is the main thing. I like the pocket on the chest for your phone with a hole for headphones inside. And you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: cbrow35

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rain coat for my boyfriend. He works outdoors. He loves it but wishes it was warmer. But does a great job for rain
customer_reviews.author: Shante

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Purchased for my 10 yo son for Christmas. He is very tall and growing very fast so did not want to pay $$$ for a rain coat he will outgrow in 6 months. He's already used it several times and stayed bone dry.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Moran

customer_reviews.title: We felt we had excellent service with this product
customer_reviews.text: We felt we had excellent service with this product. I think it was almost there the very next day. We Love the Jacket and we really appreciate the good job the Purple Peanut did in getting this product to us. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Penny Strateyjuungiesy

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this his first one so much that when it was time to replace it. He wanted to exact same one. "Its the perfect shell"
customer_reviews.author: Wiggles is 3

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Only used it one weekend so far but it looks very attractive and appears to be high quality. Great value! It might run just a touch large but it is tough to tell because I bought an XL (usually wear large) to be able to wear it comfortably over gear.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket. I'm sure I will get a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket. I'm sure I will get a lot of use out of it. Good quality and very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: MAKG

customer_reviews.title: For quick use only
customer_reviews.text: Can only stay out in rain for a short period of time before you get drenched
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not completely breathable, can't be beat for the money, it is waterproof. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: David Beglinger

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great piece of gear
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great piece of gear, i honestly didnt think it would be as water proof as it turned out to be. Its a great addition to any kayak fishermans kit.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised.
customer_reviews.text: Just came in the mail today, haven't had an opportunity to test it yet, but I'm pleasantly surprised, the material feels very nice and is fairly soft, it has a secondary liner on the inside as well. It has two inside pockets with netting and a small divider in each one, the chest pocket also seems pretty watertight and I would feel comfortable leaving my phone in it. The chest pocket is a bit small thought and my phone is about all I could fit in it. I'm 6'3 and have fairly long arms, I got the large and it fits good. It's fairly lose fitting (no problem fitting it over a hoodie).
customer_reviews.author: Charles Fortson

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction, color is not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Sleeve seem was not properly sewn. After one wear, the seam split half way up the arm. Would have returned it but I lost the darn thing after the first use. Also, the color is different from what is shown on the web page.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and fits good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really had time to wear it much yet. It's really nice and light weight, fits good. Will try to remember to add more review after I've worn it more.
customer_reviews.author: GAL

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits great this water proof jacket works great so far
customer_reviews.author: Josh Dilling

customer_reviews.title: Great little jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great rain jacket. This is my go to outer layer on runs and hikes. Love the blue color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Claye

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, overly roomy fit
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality jacket. It fits a little large (I got a large). I'm 5'11" 180lbs and athletic, and it was just too roomy, even accounting for wearing a sweatshirt or sweater under it. Planning to try the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Dawds

customer_reviews.title: the fit is as expected. I havent has the ...
customer_reviews.text: the fit is as expected. I havent has the opurtunity to use it in the rain. For light weight and breathable it my seem to be a little warm. Will review when i wear it in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Haven't had a chance to test in rainy weather.
customer_reviews.author: Raylan 70631309

customer_reviews.title: Too Stiff
customer_reviews.text: I'd like it better if the hood folded away and if the material wasn't so stiff. Still, it looks nice and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Robbot

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great material (breathes: doesn't make you clammy). Seems more fitted for thinner and tall (tight torso; long arms).
customer_reviews.author: vhelberg

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great moisture jacket, kept the rain out very well. For the Price you can't go wrong especially when compared to Patagonia or North face, I feel it is every bit as good, for much less.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Paradox Waterproof Jacket.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is very well made and comes with 3 outside zippered pockets (one small) and one large inside pocket which is handy. And, of course, it is Waterproof as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I almost ordered the Large but I'm glad I got th extra large. Thankful for the reviews about sizing.
customer_reviews.author: JayT

customer_reviews.title: Great Rain coat.
customer_reviews.text: great jacket and comfortable for my son. Perfect rain jacket for those rainy days. Shipped promptly and arrived as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn McBride

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. The fit was perfect and the style is just what I had in mind for a waterproof yet lightweight jacket for this RARE (2016) So Cal rainy season. Keep in mind that this jacket is not lined for warmth so, if it's a cold rain, I wear a sweatshirt under it. The hood provides good coverage and protection but doesn't obscure your vision. The easy to access zipper is smooth and appears sturdy. And, if all that ain't enough...The jacket is very handsome!
customer_reviews.author: Francis A

customer_reviews.title: Kinda a Tighter Fit
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but this is more like 'slim fit' jacket. Tighter around the waist. I ordered Large and it is just a little tighter fit. I am not skinny or have beer belly. Just Average guy, 5'8" tall. I will be using as an emergency in Florida so it is okay. I don't think there is any room for thick jacket under this.
customer_reviews.author: The Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, light weight rain jacket. My husband loves it. The color is really nice, as well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Semrad

customer_reviews.title: Great Rain Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love my jacket, keeps all of the rain out, dries in seconds, and keeps me warm down to about 45 degrees. If you live in the PNW this jacket is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance

customer_reviews.title: very good quality and great looking jacket
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 15 yr old son, very good quality and great looking jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the color and it really does keep you dry ...
customer_reviews.text: This really is a 5 star jacket , love the color and it really does keep you dry like it says and when you zip it all the way up , it protects your neck from the wind ! Love this jacket !
customer_reviews.author: jason Brockington

customer_reviews.title: Waterproofically speaking it's held up so far
customer_reviews.text: I've used this about 5 times and so far it's held up. Each time it was never more than what I'd call a moderate rain but I stayed dry. It's very breathable and does not insulate you if it's chilly which is what I wanted. Definitely a great buy in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: mcm1974

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. I keep one in my car for use when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very well made Also like the many pockets
customer_reviews.author: Florida lady

customer_reviews.title: Love iiiiit! I just wish the inside was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love iiiiit! I just wish the inside was a little more than the same material as the outside shell is. Get that sucker a liner and I'll be the first to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D.Roccoli

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, durable and comfortable and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Jacket just looks good! Light weight, water resistant, comfortable and durable. Second time to purchase this jacket after my zipper went out on my previous one from years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Keegan McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Don't pass this up...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband when he's out walking the dogs. Perfect for a rainy day or snow. Every time he needs to wear it he mentions how much he loves it. Great quality!!! In addition, it's not black so that's a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jerzey Lady

customer_reviews.title: Light jacket that works well and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Protects me from the rain. Looks nice. Nice and light
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Little loose fitting but that is to be expected with a rain jacket. Breathable and keeps the rain out. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Karl F LaFontaine

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hiking. Not sure how warm it would be by itself, but with my under armor hoodie underneath it did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Darren C

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect. I'm 200 lbs
customer_reviews.text: I guess a little on the large side, but with a fleece or sweatshirt underneath, it's perfect. I'm 200 lbs, 6'0", I wear a 46 suit, 34/16 shirt
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is 6'1'' and 220 lbs. the sleeves are long enough and an XL fits a fleece underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Edoremus

customer_reviews.title: Back shoulders damp
customer_reviews.text: Reviews on the jacket rated high,and that is why I purchased,but sorry to report that the item seemed to not repell the rain around the shoulder and back so it kind of appeared to remain damp when rain started all else good and light weight,but did not repell the rain as expected.
customer_reviews.author: carl jaeger

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Was a little wary of this since I've only ever owned windbreaks that advertise "waterproof" and are not; this rain jacket is 100% water proof. I've worn it in pouring rain on a bicycle going 20mph and after getting inside being dry from the waist up. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A RAIN JACKET
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is this jacket have far exceded my expectations. Not only does it keep you dry it allowes you to stay cool at the same time. This is one of the best rain jackets I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Shropshire

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this to anyone that just wants a lightweight but ...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and fits perfectly. Would recommend this to anyone that just wants a lightweight but may want next size up to put sweaters or sweatshirts under.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome jacket for college age son who never wanted a rain coat! The fit is slim and the blue color is terrific. Oh, and it keeps him dry too! Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kk sports

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking jacket. A -line fit. Not for cold weather because you can't wear a jacket underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Blacksmith

product_meta.title: Paradox Men's Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
product_meta.description: This 2.5 layer rainjacket represent the perfect combination of style and function. This jacket has a waterproof barrier, a water-repellent finish and is strategically seam-sealed to keep you dry. The center zipper offers exterior storm flaps. The reflective logo provides extra safety. This is a piece you'll pack and bring everywhere.
